post.text: If you believe in a better, stronger, fairer America: vote. hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Hayden
comment.text: Hillary's campaign amounts to slander, slime and hate....No positive message, no agenda--stagnation of the status quo....She is surrounded by satanic sycophants....The evil Hag should be in prison--under 2 FBI investigations that will continue beyond the election....The net is tightening around this corrupt evil HATEFUL LYING HAG!

replies.author: Madison
replies.text: re: " this corrupt evil LYING HAG!" Let me guess: You write poetry in your spare time, don't you?

replies.author: Hayden
replies.text: I'm a truth teller. Obviously Madison you can not handle the truth. Feeble minded jerk.

replies.author: Bailee
replies.text: Why hasn't Jay Z paid any taxes ?
